activities: IHRDC's competency management tool, CMS Online, will collect basic personal information, such as name, job title, date of birth, etc., for use in the user profile of each user.  In addition, competency assessment results will be collected and stored as part of the functionality of CMS Online.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Client information, including organizational information and assessments
